___location.description: Specifies the location of the resource.

___name.description: Name of Azure Machine Learning workspace.

___tags.description: Contains resource tags defined as key/value pairs.

$eref.description: The properties of a machine learning workspace.

___applicationInsights.description: ARM id of the application insights associated with this workspace. This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created

___storageAccount.description: ARM id of the storage account associated with this workspace. This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created

___friendlyName.description: The friendly name for this workspace. This name in mutable

___keyVault.description: ARM id of the key vault associated with this workspace. This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created

___containerRegistry.description: ARM id of the container registry associated with this workspace. This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created
